question: 蝶々
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>butterfly</kanji> with another <kanji>butterfly</kanji> added to it? It's still a <vocabulary>butterfly</vocabulary>, just a really big one with... with four wings. And laser eyes? Oh well, just go with it. It's a butterfly.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is just the on'yomi readings (which you learned with the kanji) twice in a row.
